items.title: Valerie Smith
items.content: On Monday April 27th 2020, we spoke with Valerie Smith. Valerie is an Interfaith Reverend-in-training, a certified Death Doula, and the creator behind Your Neighborhood Death Doula, an audio guide to death and grieving in isolation and pandemic â€” with weekly talks, meditations, art and writing prompts, rituals, poetry, and questions for navigating loss during Covid-19.
